name: Jetpackt
description:
A fun family-friendly game filled with close-calls, rage, anger, and more rage! :D

You are a creature wearing a jet pack for some reason and have to go through the finish line for some sort of weird reason that the game creator created.

‡‡ Controls ‡‡
  • Arrow keys to move left & right
  • Space to activate your jet pack
‡‡ Credits ‡‡ Music&Sounds
  • The background music in the start menu is 8 Bit Summer by HeatleyBros

  • The background music in the actual game is Universal by Jamie Nord Music

  • The background music in the credits is 8 Bit Space Groove! by HeatlyBros
  • The blip sound that happens whenever you press the arrow keys in the start menu is Metroid Door Sound by Brandino480 from soundbible.com
    which you can check out here
Font
  • The font used in this game is Pix Riddim by Brixdee which you can check out here
Everything else

all by me

‡‡ Having Trouble? ‡‡
  • > Help I'm raging! : Have a cup of tea, calm yourself, and keep on trying! :D
  • > Help there's a bug! : Report it :D And sorry about  that :(
  • > Help the game doesn't open! : I'm sorry. There's nothing I can do ;(
